title: Bug 37021 - Source path is wrong in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path is wrong in declare warning on binary files. When using .class files from injars, the sourcepath is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. In some cases, the filenames may not appear at all in the declare warning messages. These issues can be observed by running the code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/ directory. Please note that the tests may produce false positives due to the absence of filename checking in harness verification of messages.
OB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the sourcepath is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' rather than 'app/Main'. I have also seen instances where the filenames do not appear at all, but these occurrences are not replicated in the provided tests.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the sourcepath should be listed in the form 'app/Main' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Go to the tests/new/binaryWarnings/ directory.
2. Run the code in this directory.
3. Observe the declare warning messages and note that the sourcepath is displayed incorrectly as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
